meanings.definition: The state or quality of being available for interaction or exchange between multiple parties.
meanings.sent1: The interavailabilities of the two teams allowed for a successful collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The interavailabilities of the internet and smartphones make communication easy.
meanings.sent3: The interavailabilities of the cats and dogs led to a hilarious game of chase.
meanings.sent4: The interavailabilities of the market and consumers create a dynamic economy.
meanings.sent5: The interavailabilities of the keys and locks ensure security in the building.

meanings.definition: The ability for different entities to be accessible or obtainable for mutual use or benefit.
meanings.sent1: The interavailabilities of the tools in the workshop allow for efficient work.
meanings.sent2: The interavailabilities of the library books benefit students and researchers.
meanings.sent3: The interavailabilities of the sun and clouds made for a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent4: The interavailabilities of supply and demand drive the market.
meanings.sent5: The interavailabilities of the ingredients in the recipe ensure a delicious meal.
